column2: The rain is continuing in [Root.GetName] and we haven't seen a blue sky for weeks. We need sufficient rain for our fields, but excessive rain will cause a bad crop this coming autumn.
We pray to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to stop the rain.
The weather in [Root.GetName] is extremely cold this year. A cool summer is welcome, however poor people are dying from the cold and the  peasants begin to worry about their crops this autumn.
Because of bad weather or demon's work, the crops in [Root.GetName] were terrible this year. We have to prepare for the coming food shortage.
Let's hope that we can survive this winter.

The bad crops brought a serious famine in [Root.GetName]! There is nothing to eat and the peasants are selling their family as slaves. They might be still happier than the people who have died from hunger.
Buy foods and help the poor peasants and citizens!
Thanks to the protection of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], we have good crops in [Root.GetName]. We can hold a great harvest feast this year!
We have nothing to worry about this winter.
